job_desp: Principal Data Scientist – Seller Intelligence PlatformWho We Are? Coupang's Seller Services Technology team is building out a Seller Intelligence platform to empower sellers with data, analytics insight, and tools to help them build a successful business as sellers on Coupang's marketplace. This is a strategic offering that will differentiate Coupang from its competitors by building a scalable distributed big data and analytics platform to provide insightful and actionable data and tools to Coupang's sellers. Sellers will love our intelligence platform as it will help them grow their businesses, which will in turn grow Coupang's business and make Coupang sellers' Number 1 choice of their online marketplace.How We Do? Our goal is to make 3P seller success in Coupang Marketplace platform. Today, Coupang has more than 100K sellers running business in its platform, but there is no  specific service to coach sellers how to improve their sales efficiency, how to become best sellers, how to become successful in Coupang marketplace platform. For example, Sellers do not know whether their items are getting traffic, or whether they are getting traffic but not sales, or whether their items are selling well among items in the same category, Sellers are flying blind when they are operating their businesses on Coupang and would not know what knobs to turn in order to improve their business performances on Coupang. We will build machine learning platform to analyze features from product, front metrics, orders, service, delivery and so on that could impact seller performance to develop sophisticated seller profile model that supports prediction/simulation/recommendation services. For example, conversion rate of each seller’s product could be analyzed and detect the possible pain point, like pricing, service, and nudge sellers to change price if needed. Data scientists will play an important role in the team to training/develop the data model, evaluate performance of model offline and analyze the online feedbacks to optimize the performance. Also DS will support engineering team to make ML platform to facilitate/automate the data modeling/evaluation/deployment process. We provide the Data Science team with Data Engineering, Software Engineer and Data Analysis resources to ensure the Data Science team can focus on building the best modelsResponsibilities: •	Research and build statistical/probability models to proactively provide strategic recommendations to business partners that can drive effective impact•	Build up models to analyze seller related data to figure out the pain-point of seller success and predict remedy for improvement using machine learning technology.•	Conduct in-depth data analyses to drive and deliver insights to help business partners make strategic decision (simulation)•	Implement date science and data mining techniques to solve business problems•	Work with Engineering teams, support them to leverage various tools to automate models and reports•	Cares deeply about data quality and demonstrates this commitment by attention to quality of data and code generatedQualifications: •	Masters/PhDs in Statistics, CS, OR or a quantitative discipline preferred•	Having conducted analyses for ecommerce 3P business is a preferred•	3+ years of experience in data analytics /data mining and statistical methods application. 5+ years of professional experience in such areas preferred•	Work experience in programming using R/Python/Scala to apply statistical/analytical/data mining methods to solve problems•	Work experience with Hadoop and relevant tools, such as Pig, Mahout, Airflow, etc.•	Strong research and analytical mindset and extremely output-oriented•	Take initiative and ownership of work. Creative thinking and problem solving skills required•	Strong capability to draw insights/conclusions from raw data and summarize results quickly and efficiently•	Team player with excellent interpersonal skills, self-motivated, energetic, “CAN-DO” attitude and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-moving environment•	Strong data visualization skills is a plus, such as Excel pivot tables, Tableau, etc.

job_desp: 岗位描述1. 主要负责智能商业搜索和推荐算法优化，除了提升平台整体收入目标，还需要提升包括用户、商家、平台在内的整体淘宝生态质量：利用电商大规模异构数据进行建模，通过对用户特别是商家等多智能体行为分析、来理解淘宝生态的变化趋势和规律，引入推动生态升级的优化目标；将大规模的深度学习，多目标学习，强化学习等算法落地到用户偏好预测、商家家行为预测，个性化排序和推荐等业务中；2. 主要负责营销场景和新商业机制优化：通过对店铺、商品、分仓等多维度数据的建模来进行实时销量预测，从而指导商家做品类规划和营销计划，同时和供应链相结合，指导卖家入库和备货，结合流量端调控，提升供应链效率，降低卖家运营成本，达到卖家，买家和平台共赢。3. 主要负责多场景协同优化技术的应用：利用多智能体机器学习和增强学习来解决包括搜索、推荐、广告、营销等多场景的联合优化问题和流量调控等问题，同时利用博弈论和控制论的思路建立更好的搜索排序机制并优化流量资源的合理分配；4. 主要负责用大数据给商家赋能，构建相关的的大数据分析算法和平台：分析电商搜索推荐的商业化数据，对商品，商家，行业，类目等个维度的流量，竞争状态和趋势发展，进行定量的统计，分析和预测，设计各种商业数据分析预测决策算法，搭建新型智能商业数据平台。岗位要求1、硕士及以上学历，计算机、信号处理、控制论、博弈论、运筹优化，统计等相关专业；有扎实的数理分析基础并有交叉领域研究经验的优先；2、熟悉常用机器学习算法，特别是对各种人工智能应用问题有大量研究实践经验者优先，有实际成果并发表在国际顶级会议、期刊者优先，有大型搜索／推荐／广告算法架构设计经验者优先；3、熟练掌握Java，C++等常用的编程语言以及Python等脚本语言，有大规模分布式计算框架开发经验，有基于TF、Caffe等深度学习算法开发经验或者相关研究背景的优先；4、积极主动的技术热情，强烈的责任感，和踏实勤奋的工作态度；有良好的沟通能力，跨团队协作能力，具备出色的规划、执行力，强烈的责任感，以及优秀的学习能力；北京 上海 杭州 广州

job_desp: Our goal is to build the best e-commerce experience for our customers. We get millions of products from sellers and we want to build a consistent experience by automatically detecting features from catalog, and enriching the catalog with structured information. We use machine learning to develop models to extract missing data from text, detect inaccuracies and fix them automatically. We strive to build efficient workflows allowing humans to apply their judgment only when necessary.Now we have 80M different products, ti will increase to 200M in 2017. it's big challenge to standardize, merge products, and also very interest to choose best product info showing on page.On a daily basis, we solve problems from different kinds product categories ranging from cellphone cases to fashion. We consume various sources of data such as catalog, reviews, views etc. to continually enhance the catalog. And we do all of this at scale that is growing at relentlessly.We are building our DS team to help us improve product info quality - attributions, image etc. You will be working on hardest problems of informational retrieval and machine learning, computer vision, operating with large data sets and building platforms that will help us scale. You will research problems and build high quality, architecturally sound systems that solve those problems. We will use machine learning, data mining, data analysis and NLP to improve whole catalog platform data quality, while bringing value to customers iteratively.

job_desp: 机器学习/深度学习方向：1. 参与公司核心机器学习算法设计与开发，成果将应用于各产品线，提供智能供应链解决方案；2. 构建高效率的算法平台，优化零售各环节的成本、效率等；3. 负责机器学习、深度学习领域的算法模型研究工作； 对计算机视觉、自然语言处理等领域提供模型支持；4. 负责机器学习尤其是深度学习前沿问题的探索与研究，结合未来实际应用场景，提供全面的技术解决方案。预测方向：1. 参与JD新一代智能预测体系搭建，深入了解和挖掘业务痛点并提出可行的解决方案；2. 运用数据挖掘和机器学习等技术深入分析海量销量、订单、促销等数据，建立预测领域相关模型，包括但不限于时序模型、回归模型、计量经济模型、深度学习模型等；3. 参与海量数据分析与统计，能够深入分析现有模型不足，持续优化算法；4. 跟进数据挖掘，机器学习相关技术的业界发展，并合理的运用到实际产品。深度学习专家：1.扎实的数据建模基础，熟悉常见的机器学习shallow model模型算法，比如逻辑回归、GBDT、Random Forest等；2.良好的Deep Learning建模基础，熟悉CNN/DNN/RNN/CTC等Deep Learning建模技术，对Deep Learning调参细节有清晰的把握；3. 在某个子领域有过较深入的建模经验积累，比如NLP，推荐，图像，语音等；4.对deep learning最新技术进展保持持续关注。

job_desp: 岗位职责设计并构建NLP基础平台，用于处理各类NLP任务。构建NLP相关的预测模型，服务于用户画像、推荐、广告等系统。处理海量原始文本数据，提炼文本相关特征。为几乎所有重要语言构建语言模型。测试、评估、监控现有系统和产品的表现。探索、利用最前沿的NLP技术来解决现有的和新的NLP相关问题。最低需求计算机或相关专业的学士学位。三年以上NLP工业界工作经验。在至少一项NLP任务上有深入经验。有大规模、分布式NLP系统的经验。有使用NLP工具和系统的经验。有数据分析和机器学习的经验。有使用Linux或类似POSIX系统的经验。有Python和Shell的编程经验。流利掌握中文或英文。很强的自我驱动力、结果导向并极具责任感。有激情、毅力，正能量。有良好沟通能力和团队协作精神。有合格的英文能力。锦上添花的需求有构建输入法引擎、推荐系统或者计算广告系统的经验。有构建分布式计算系统的经验。有神经网络和深度学习方面的经验。有很强的数据结构和算法知识。在NLP，机器学习、信息检索等相关领域有硕士或博士学位。说明和其他类型的数据不同，自然语言数据和对它的处理，本身就可以被视为是计算机科学的一个重要分支。使用、处理和理解自然语言也一直是触宝科技的核心任务之一。尽管处理文本数据通常比处理其他数据要难上一个数量级，但文本数据所能揭示的信息比其他数据更有用、更具内涵。随着我们产品和用户的增长，我们需要更多在NLP领域的优秀人才和我们一道更好的利用文本数据，来构建更加智能的系统。

job_desp: 【工作职责】1、配合公司销售深入理解药企客户需求，制定合适的实施方案、执行时间表。2、同时处理及协调多个项目各环节的工作，完成项目过程和跟踪管理；3、汇总整理项目相关文档资料，并记录备案；4、关注项目进展，预警项目风险，定期汇报总结项目情况；5、协调处理部门其他日常事务。【岗位要求】1、至少1年以上项目管理及落地执行经验；2、具有较强的分析能力、学习能力、执行能力及抗压能力；3、具有高度的团队合作精神，善于沟通及组织协调；4、熟练使用WORD、EXCLE、POWERPOINT等办公软件；5、有医疗软件或互联网医疗项目经验优先；6、对接药企客户经验优先。【春雨医生】春雨医生是中国乃至世界上最大的移动医患交流平台，也是中国移动健康（M-health）的第一品牌。致力于为国人提供更优质、经济、便捷的健康服务。公司成立于2011年7月，主产品「春雨医生」App于2011年11月上线，专注于利用手机终端实现医生与患者随时随地的远程交流，并在此基础上，面向个人用户、医药企业、医疗机构、地方政府，提供健康档案、空中医院、互联网医院和开放平台等深入服务，发展成为了一个大型的移动医疗服务平台。此外，春雨医生沉淀大量技术和知识资产，在机器学习、人工智能和互联网技术开发等能力上处于行业内绝对领先的水平，同时携手医院等机构合作，研究共同面临的新业务和技术课题。春雨医生目前已吸引超过50万公立医院执业医师入驻，累积服务患者超过2亿人次，成为破解我国就医难题的有效途径。秉承“开放、联结、共赢”的企业精神，春雨医生正在成为一家集“智能技术驱动、医疗资源整合和健康服务创新”于一体的行业领导者。【春雨团队】如果你也拥有冒险精神，乐于颠覆传统挑战未知；如果你也具有先锋品质，勇于成为移动医疗开拓者；如果你也怀揣浪漫情怀，致力建造新医疗生态；那么，欢迎你成为春雨的一员。【春雨福利】1.免费的午餐；2.每年一次免费体检，捷足先登的医疗服务；3.每年10天带薪年假；4.每月享有福利卡补贴；5.每月“一呼百应”的活动；6.每周享有的羽毛球、篮球、台球、乒乓球健身活动；7.匹配休息室、健身房的办公环境。

job_req:
本科及以上 5年以上经验
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. Our mission is to create a world in which Customers ask “How did I ever live without Coupang?” We are looking for passionate builders to help us get there. Powered by world-class technology and operations, we have set out to transform the end-to-end Customer experience -- from revolutionizing last-mile delivery to rethinking how Customers search and discover on a truly mobile-first platform. We have been named one of the “50 Smartest Companies in the World” by MIT Technology Review and “30 Global Game Changers” by Forbes.Coupang is a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.Who We Are? Coupang's Seller Services Technology team is building out a Seller Intelligence platform to empower sellers with data, analytics insight, and tools to help them build a successful business as sellers on Coupang's marketplace. This is a strategic offering that will differentiate Coupang from its competitors by building a scalable distributed big data and analytics platform to provide insightful and actionable data and tools to Coupang's sellers. Sellers will love our intelligence platform as it will help them grow their businesses, which will in turn grow Coupang's business and make Coupang sellers' Number 1 choice of their online marketplace.How We Do? Our goal is to make 3P seller success in Coupang Marketplace platform. Today, Coupang has more than 100K sellers running business in its platform, but there is no  specific service to coach sellers how to improve their sales efficiency, how to become best sellers, how to become successful in Coupang marketplace platform. For example, Sellers do not know whether their items are getting traffic, or whether they are getting traffic but not sales, or whether their items are selling well among items in the same category, Sellers are flying blind when they are operating their businesses on Coupang and would not know what knobs to turn in order to improve their business performances on Coupang. We will build machine learning platform to analyze features from product, front metrics, orders, service, delivery and so on that could impact seller performance to develop sophisticated seller profile model that supports prediction/simulation/recommendation services. For example, conversion rate of each seller’s product could be analyzed and detect the possible pain point, like pricing, service, and nudge sellers to change price if needed. Data scientists will play an important role in the team to training/develop the data model, evaluate performance of model offline and analyze the online feedbacks to optimize the performance. Also DS will support engineering team to make ML platform to facilitate/automate the data modeling/evaluation/deployment process. We provide the Data Science team with Data Engineering, Software Engineer and Data Analysis resources to ensure the Data Science team can focus on building the best modelsResponsibilities: •	Research and build statistical/probability models to proactively provide strategic recommendations to business partners that can drive effective impact•	Build up models to analyze seller related data to figure out the pain-point of seller success and predict remedy for improvement using machine learning technology.•	Conduct in-depth data analyses to drive and deliver insights to help business partners make strategic decision (simulation)•	Implement date science and data mining techniques to solve business problems•	Work with Engineering teams, support them to leverage various tools to automate models and reports•	Cares deeply about data quality and demonstrates this commitment by attention to quality of data and code generatedQualifications: •	Masters/PhDs in Statistics, CS, OR or a quantitative discipline preferred•	Having conducted analyses for ecommerce 3P business is a preferred•	3+ years of experience in data analytics /data mining and statistical methods application. 5+ years of professional experience in such areas preferred•	Work experience in programming using R/Python/Scala to apply statistical/analytical/data mining methods to solve problems•	Work experience with Hadoop and relevant tools, such as Pig, Mahout, Airflow, etc.•	Strong research and analytical mindset and extremely output-oriented•	Take initiative and ownership of work. Creative thinking and problem solving skills required•	Strong capability to draw insights/conclusions from raw data and summarize results quickly and efficiently•	Team player with excellent interpersonal skills, self-motivated, energetic, “CAN-DO” attitude and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-moving environment•	Strong data visualization skills is a plus, such as Excel pivot tables, Tableau, etc.

job_req:
博士 5年以上经验
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: Data Scientist – Supply Chain Management AutomationLevel: PrincipalCoupang is the world’s fastest growing e-Commerce company. In only its fourth year, Coupang boasts over 20mn subscribers and annual revenue run rate of over $2bn. It is the No. 1 player in mobile e-commerce in Korea, which is a massive $50bn market opportunity. On top of that, in Jun 2015, we raised $1B in an investment led by SoftBank. It comes less than half a year after we received $300mn led by BlackRock BLK Private Equity Partners, and a year after we raised $100mn in a round led by Sequoia Capital Global Equities and Sequoia Heritage venture funds, which then valued the company at more than $5B.Who We Are? The Supply Chain Data Science team is responsible for predicting what customers want to buy and automate the ordering process. We create a daily demand forecast for all Coupang’s Retail SKUs, every day. We work with internal stakeholders to solve challenging Supply Chain problems at scale. Our systems ensure Coupang’s customers are delighted with consistently available products. Automation supports scale and efficiency of our Supply Chain processes.How We Do It? We use Machine Learning processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. We focus on Time Series models for predicting customer demand. We provide the Data Science team with Data Engineering, Software Engineer and Data Analysis resources to ensure the Data Science team can focus on building the best models. Our goal is to apply cutting edge models into our production environment, using a deep understanding of the e-commerce business domain to demonstrate results in production. We join big thinking with a pragmatic approach to measuring results. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Data Scientists work with a cross-functional team of Engineers, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly. Responsibilities: •	Cooperate with data scientists: Verify and implement models to predict customer demand, recommend supplier order quantities and make inventory management recommendations•	Build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Explore new Machine Learning applications to Time Series prediction•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Mentor junior engineers and provide career development adviceQualifications: •	8+ years software development experience;•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in Python or Java•	Working experience with Python ML libraries (SciKit, Pandas) a plus•	Working experience with R, Scala a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with both Relational DBs and NoSQL •	Passion to learn new technologies

We have been named one of the “50 Smartest Companies in the World” by MIT Technology Review and “30 Global Game Changers” by Forbes.Coupang is a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.At Marketing Platform, we build the core platform and services that power Coupang’s growth. Our products and services help marketers make intelligent decisions on best marketing channels to use for the ideal set of target customers at the most appropriate time.  We use real-time stream processing and machine learning to build scalable AI services that will be used across all of Coupang. What You'll Do•	Build scalable systems that will have a direct impact on customer acquisition, experience, conversion and retention•	Collaboration with product owners, stakeholders and designers to implement new applications•	Design the common front code convention and share best practices and improve processes within and across agile teams, and mentor more junior developers•	Design scalable front architecture and implement the UI based on the UI wireframe from designer and ensure the development quality Qualifications:●	Bachelor or above degree in Computer Science or related●	At least 5 years’ experience in web frontend development●	Have deep understanding of browser internal mechanism●	Experience with object oriented programming and expert in Javascript, HTML5, CSS●	Extensive experiences in different UI framework/tools like Jquery, Reactjs, requirejs, AngularJS, SCSS/LESS...etc(at least expert in one of them)●	Deep understanding of MVC/MVP/MVVM etc design pattern, experiences in designing and implementing the modular design●	Extensive experiences in tuning the front performance and have visible result example.●	Must be able to make the design trade off with best suitable framework and tool.●	Good knowledge about network, front cache, HTTP/2 and RESTful specification●	Mobile web development experience is a plus
address: 公司地址：上海市浦东新区金科路2889号 长泰广场C座 7楼

job_desp: １、研究自然语言处理算法，实现相关信息处理，比如：中文分词、词性标注、垃圾识别、命名实体识别、情感分析、分类、自动文本聚类等；2、对大数据语料进行分词、词性标注、依存文法分析、信息提取、文本挖掘等技术研发；4、结合自然语言处理技术，合理运用算法实践，编写程序实现文本信息挖掘；、5、负责相关新技术和发展方向的跟踪研究职位要求：１、具有丰富的自然语言处理专业知识，具有实际的数据处理经验；2、熟悉自然语言处理、机器学习、模式识别等常用算法，对NLP方向有浓厚兴趣与自我驱动力；3、熟悉信息检索基本概念，有文本挖掘 （分类、聚类、摘要、结构化信息提取）、中文信息处理 （如分词与词性标注、命名实体识别、信息抽取系统、问答系统等）、知识系统等方面的研究与开发经验； 4、了解hadoop、spark等分布式计算框架者； 熟悉spring等主流Web框架。5、熟练使用Linux、MYSQL数据库；-计算机及计算机相关专业本科或本科以上学历。-两年及以上相关大型系统研发工作经验-精通Linux/Unix平台上的Java编程，熟练掌握Spring, Mybatis等主流的开发框架有良好的编程习惯-能够熟练应用JSP/Servlet/JavaScript等WEB开发技术,熟悉脚本编程（如Shell, Python等）-精通网络编程、多线程编程，熟悉开源计算、存储系统（如MySQL、Mongodb、Redis等）的管理或应用-具备优秀的逻辑思维能力，对解决挑战性问题充满热情，善于解决问题和分析问题-有强烈的上进心和求知欲，善于学习新事物-良好的团队合作精神，较强的沟通能力和学习能力

job_req:
统招本科 5年以上经验
英语 + 普通话 年龄不限
job_desp: Job description	Works with PayPal business units and Product Dev teams to design, develop and deliver data solutions on one of the largest data platforms in the world. 	Supports PayPal business units by providing data in a ready-to-use form to data analysts and data scientists for Business insights, predictive analytics, machine learning, etc.	Owns and is accountable for the design and development of a Data solution feature or a Data Pipeline.	Spends most of the time developing data pipelines/ETL code for solving various data requirements using traditional ETL tools but also has experience & skills for building custom data pipelines.  	Code is well-commented, easy to maintain, and can be reused across a sub-system or feature. Code may persist for the lifetime of a software version	Code is thoroughly tested with very few bugs, and is supported by unit tests.	Beginning to lead feature or sub-system design reviews and code reviews and be recognized as the go-to developer for that component.	Recognized as the go-to developer for a product or major sub-system and is seen as a leader in their specialized field.    	Leads feature or component design reviews and code reviews and is fully recognized as the go-to developer for that component.	Participates in architecture discussions, proposes and discusses solutions to system and product changes that are directly related to their area of focus.	Responsible for managing multiple Applications, providing necessary support and maintenance activities.	Should be comfortable working in an agile environment and with cross-functional teams, should have appetite to learn and be flexible to pick up new technology.Job Requirements:	EE/CS or related majors. Bachelor and above.	5+ years working in data engineer or a similar role in large enterprise data warehouse teams preferred.	Can be relied on to deliver a data pipeline on time and to requirements, without data quality issues. 	Leads the team, and contributes effectively to the success of those that they interact with regularly.	Can triage and resolve data / process issues  	Able to evangelize best practices through prototyping or other means. 	Helps to resolve site data base issues and SLA, ATB impacts.	Good understanding of Data Modelling Concepts, experience with modelling data and metadata to support relational & non relational database implementations; experience with building Logical and Physical data models. 	Familiar with various big data technologies, open source data processing frameworks.	Evaluates and implements data solutions with various big-data technologies.	Good understanding of data processing, data structure optimization and design for scalability.	Optimize ETL processing of extremely large datasets; Optimization for SLAs	Good understanding of REST-oriented APIs , understanding of distributed systems, data streaming, NoSQL solutions for creating and managing data integration pipelines for Batch and Real Time Data needs.	Excellent communication and team player skills to collaborate with cross functional teams for successful delivery of Data solutions.	Understanding of  version control systems, particularly GIT.	Strong analytical and problem solving skills.	Good understanding of database principles and SQL beyond just data access.	Expert in multiple Programming/scripting languages, i.e.Unix/Linux Shell Scripting, Perl, Python, C++, Java, Python, Ruby, Scala,etc	Intermediate level knowledge on following technologies: ­	Spark with Python or Scala ­	HBase­	Hive/Pig­	Scripting (Shell, Python, Java)­	Database fundamentals (Oracle or Teradata) ­	Hadoop echo system­	Elastic search	Intermediate level knowledge on following business domains is a plus:­	Marketing­	Customer Service­	Payments­	Merchant servicing­	E-commerce	Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.
address: 公司地址：上海浦东新区

job_req:
统招本科 8年以上经验
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. Our mission is to create a world in which Customers ask “How did I ever live without Coupang?” We are looking for passionate builders to help us get there. Powered by world-class technology and operations, we have set out to transform the end-to-end Customer experience -- from revolutionizing last-mile delivery to rethinking how Customers search and discover on a truly mobile-first platform. We have been named one of the “50 Smartest Companies in the World” by MIT Technology Review and “30 Global Game Changers” by Forbes.Coupang is a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.Who We Are? Coupang’s Global Operation has 3 large operation groups: CS, FC, and Delivery. Together, the group consist of thousands full time, part time and outsourced workers. To help lower price component of the e­Commerce flywheel, increasing productivity is a key KPI for Global Ops team. Before improvements can be made, ops must first be able to measure their productivity. LMS (Labor Management System) aggregates information from our time/attendance and each operation tools. Using the information, the system will create reporting and analytics functions geared toward guiding compliance and answering productivity related questions. In 2017, the target is to have LMS support the 3 largest operation teams within Global Operation group, but LMS platform is extensible to support all Coupang operation teams in the future. LMS also includes the effective staffing, forecasting, scheduling, and real-time adjustments required for the organization to be as efficient as possible. The objective is to get the right number of people and the right workers, in the right place at the right time, doing the right tasks. How We Do? Each piece of LMS was generated by data, so the data accuracy is the most critical character. We built up the data platform as the foundation to collect, analyze and distribute the valued info with coupang systems. LMS is connected with WMS, TMS and Rings to share the productivity data and helps the high-level management team to adjust the business strategy.We create the hybrid mobile app to track the employees working behavior and status. Find anything possible to improve the productivity and also make the employee working balance better. To achieve that we would work with our Data Science team and introduce the Big Data into the system to obtain any data generated by operations, that would create the benchmark for each type of operation more accurate and efficient.In future, we’re going to make the work more predictable with Machine Learning, that will allow Coupang to better understand future demand to allow for more efficient scheduling. The real-time workforce data is critical to ensuring that Coupang’s business activities are less time consuming and more coherent and efficient. With effective labor management, Coupang will be able to provide exceptional service at the lowest cost possible.Responsibilities: •	Maintenance of the LMS data platform and hybrid app•	Develop new features of LMS data platform and hybrid app•	Translate application storyboards and use cases into functional applications•	Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications•	Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems•	Monitor the system and provide the root cause analysis report of issues•	Communicate and collaborate with other system teams to sync up data•	Work with Data warehouse team to verify the data among systemsQualifications: •	10+ years of experience in systems architecture, analysis and applications program development required•	B.S./ M.S. Computer Engineering/Science/MIS or equivalent•	Experience with Spring MVC, AngularJS, and RESTful•	Core Java developer with a desire to work in a fast paced, test-driven, agile, collaborative and iterative programming environment.•	Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git•	Familiarity with build tools such as Ant, Maven, and Gradle•	Experience with databases, SQL, query optimization, data modeling•	NoSQL(Redis/Cassandra/HBase/MongoDB)•	Self motivated, takes initiative and works well with extended team members.•	Passion to learn new technologies•	Excellent oral and written English communication skills•	Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, EMR) is plus

job_desp: Software Engineer – Supply Chain Management AutomationLevel: PrincipalCoupang is the world’s fastest growing e-Commerce company. In only its fourth year, Coupang boasts over 20mn subscribers and annual revenue run rate of over $2bn. It is the No. 1 player in mobile e-commerce in Korea, which is a massive $50bn market opportunity. On top of that, in Jun 2015, we raised $1B in an investment led by SoftBank. It comes less than half a year after we received $300mn led by BlackRock BLK Private Equity Partners, and a year after we raised $100mn in a round led by Sequoia Capital Global Equities and Sequoia Heritage venture funds, which then valued the company at more than $5B.Who We Are? Supply Chain Automation is responsible for predicting what customers want to buy and automate the ordering process. We create a daily demand forecast for all Coupang’s Retail SKUs, every day. We work with internal stakeholders to solve challenging Supply Chain problems at scale. Our systems ensure Coupang’s customers are delighted with consistently available products. Automation supports scale and efficiency of our Supply Chain processes.How We Do? We use Big Data processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly.Responsibilities: •	Cooperate with data scientists: Verify and implement models to predict customer demand, recommend supplier order quantities and make inventory management recommendations•	Build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Explore new Machine Learning applications to Time Series prediction•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Mentor junior engineers and provide career development adviceQualifications: •	8+ years software development experience;•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in Python or Java•	Working experience with Python ML libraries (SciKit, Pandas) a plus•	Working experience with R, Scala a plus•	Experience with microservices a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with both Relational DBs and NoSQL •	Passion to learn new technologies

job_req:
统招本科 7年以上经验
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. Our mission is to create a world in which Customers ask “How did I ever live without Coupang?” We are looking for passionate builders to help us get there. Powered by world-class technology and operations, we have set out to transform the end-to-end Customer experience -- from revolutionizing last-mile delivery to rethinking how Customers search and discover on a truly mobile-first platform. We have been named one of the “50 Smartest Companies in the World” by MIT Technology Review and “30 Global Game Changers” by Forbes.Coupang is a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.Who We Are? FDS (Fraud Detection System) protects online transactions from fraudsters and abusers. We build highly sophisticated and analytics-based systems and services that scan massive amounts of transaction-related data (buyer, seller, payment, etc.) to uncover underlying correlations and detect fraud and abuse patterns, as well as tools and processes for operation teams to investigate and act on these. A robust FDS protects Coupang’s brand and image, prevents negative impacts to Customers and Sellers and reduces revenue loss. Our mission is to ensure that every transaction is trusted, safe, and protected from fraud. We build the brand image that Coupang is a trustworthy place to buy things and do business. One important aspect of e-Commerce service is to always simplify and streamline user experience, providing more convenience for customers. This cannot be done without the critical support of FDS, which ensures convenience doesn’t come with fraud and abuse.  FDS is also a mandatory service from a compliance perspective, both for Coupang as an open e-Commerce platform, and for RocketPay. How We Do? By leveraging state-of-the-art Big Data technologies and machine learning expertise, we try to build a data-driven culture for fraud detection and risk management. We deeply believe in the machine learning approach to fight fraudsters and protect our customers, and are the early adopters for Big Data and Machine Learning technologies at scale in Coupang. We view Big Data and Machine Learning as our core strengths. Starting from data acquisition to predictive models, FDS Tribe teams are organized into several smaller groups including FDS Commerce, FDS Payment, FDS Data Platform and FDS Science. The FDS tribe is a true blending group with both data scientists and aspired technologists. Advanced analytics powered by strong engineering muscles creates solutions to one of the most compelling battles for e-Commerce company like Coupang. We’re the modern detectives hunting for fraudulent activities, but only with better weapons in our hands.Responsibilities: •	Collecting and analysis base data for big data analysis;•	Maintenance Hadoop platform;•	Development Hadoop framework;•	Cooperate with data scientist, verify and implement data models to realize automatic and accurate fraud detection, in order to improve the risk management level of E-commerce/payment platforms;•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Play an active role in company's anti-fraud platform strategy;•	Support related data analysis work, and provide valuable business reports;Qualifications: •	5+ years software development experience;•	Masters/PhDs in CS machine learning, Statistics, Applied Math or a quantitative field;•	Good at at least one program language(JAVA, C, C++, etc.);•	Experience in operating and development Hadoop system;•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with SQL(MySQL/Oracle/MSSQL) &;•	NoSQL(Redis/Cassandra/HBase/MongoDB);•	Passion to learn new technologies

job_desp: Principal Data Engineer-Fraud Detection SystemWho We Are? FDS (Fraud Detection System) protects online transactions from fraudsters and abusers. We build highly sophisticated and analytics-based systems and services that scan massive amounts of transaction-related data (buyer, seller, payment, etc.) to uncover underlying correlations and detect fraud and abuse patterns, as well as tools and processes for operation teams to investigate and act on these. A robust FDS protects Coupang’s brand and image, prevents negative impacts to Customers and Sellers and reduces revenue loss. Our mission is to ensure that every transaction is trusted, safe, and protected from fraud. We build the brand image that Coupang is a trustworthy place to buy things and do business. One important aspect of e-Commerce service is to always simplify and streamline user experience, providing more convenience for customers. This cannot be done without the critical support of FDS, which ensures convenience doesn’t come with fraud and abuse.  FDS is also a mandatory service from a compliance perspective, both for Coupang as an open e-Commerce platform, and for RocketPay. How We Do? By leveraging state-of-the-art Big Data technologies and machine learning expertise, we try to build a data-driven culture for fraud detection and risk management. We deeply believe in the machine learning approach to fight fraudsters and protect our customers, and are the early adopters for Big Data and Machine Learning technologies at scale in Coupang. We view Big Data and Machine Learning as our core strengths. Starting from data acquisition to predictive models, FDS Tribe teams are organized into several smaller groups including FDS Commerce, FDS Payment, FDS Data Platform and FDS Science. The FDS tribe is a true blending group with both data scientists and aspired technologists. Advanced analytics powered by strong engineering muscles creates solutions to one of the most compelling battles for e-Commerce company like Coupang. We’re the modern detectives hunting for fraudulent activities, but only with better weapons in our hands.Responsibilities: •	Collecting and analysis base data for big data analysis;•	Maintenance Hadoop platform;•	Development Hadoop framework;•	Cooperate with data scientist, verify and implement data models to realize automatic and accurate fraud detection, in order to improve the risk management level of E-commerce/payment platforms;•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Play an active role in company's anti-fraud platform strategy;•	Support related data analysis work, and provide valuable business reports;Qualifications: •	5+ years software development experience;•	Masters/PhDs in CS machine learning, Statistics, Applied Math or a quantitative field;•	Good at at least one program language(JAVA, C, C++, etc.);•	Experience in operating and development Hadoop system;•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with SQL(MySQL/Oracle/MSSQL) &;•	NoSQL(Redis/Cassandra/HBase/MongoDB);•	Passion to learn new technologies

In only its fourth year, Coupang boasts over 20 million subscribers and annual revenue run rate over $2 billion. job_desp: Principal Data Scientist – Seller Intelligence PlatformWho We Are? Coupang's Seller Services Technology team is building out a Seller Intelligence platform to empower sellers with data, analytics insight, and tools to help them build a successful business as sellers on Coupang's marketplace. This is a strategic offering that will differentiate Coupang from its competitors by building a scalable distributed big data and analytics platform to provide insightful and actionable data and tools to Coupang's sellers. Sellers will love our intelligence platform as it will help them grow their businesses, which will in turn grow Coupang's business and make Coupang sellers' Number 1 choice of their online marketplace.How We Do? Our goal is to make 3P seller success in Coupang Marketplace platform. Today, Coupang has more than 100K sellers running business in its platform, but there is no  specific service to coach sellers how to improve their sales efficiency, how to become best sellers, how to become successful in Coupang marketplace platform. For example, Sellers do not know whether their items are getting traffic, or whether they are getting traffic but not sales, or whether their items are selling well among items in the same category, Sellers are flying blind when they are operating their businesses on Coupang and would not know what knobs to turn in order to improve their business performances on Coupang. We will build machine learning platform to analyze features from product, front metrics, orders, service, delivery and so on that could impact seller performance to develop sophisticated seller profile model that supports prediction/simulation/recommendation services. For example, conversion rate of each seller’s product could be analyzed and detect the possible pain point, like pricing, service, and nudge sellers to change price if needed. Data scientists will play an important role in the team to training/develop the data model, evaluate performance of model offline and analyze the online feedbacks to optimize the performance. Also DS will support engineering team to make ML platform to facilitate/automate the data modeling/evaluation/deployment process. We provide the Data Science team with Data Engineering, Software Engineer and Data Analysis resources to ensure the Data Science team can focus on building the best modelsResponsibilities: •	Research and build statistical/probability models to proactively provide strategic recommendations to business partners that can drive effective impact•	Build up models to analyze seller related data to figure out the pain-point of seller success and predict remedy for improvement using machine learning technology.•	Conduct in-depth data analyses to drive and deliver insights to help business partners make strategic decision (simulation)•	Implement date science and data mining techniques to solve business problems•	Work with Engineering teams, support them to leverage various tools to automate models and reports•	Cares deeply about data quality and demonstrates this commitment by attention to quality of data and code generatedQualifications: •	Masters/PhDs in Statistics, CS, OR or a quantitative discipline preferred•	Having conducted analyses for ecommerce 3P business is a preferred•	3+ years of experience in data analytics /data mining and statistical methods application. 5+ years of professional experience in such areas preferred•	Work experience in programming using R/Python/Scala to apply statistical/analytical/data mining methods to solve problems•	Work experience with Hadoop and relevant tools, such as Pig, Mahout, Airflow, etc.•	Strong research and analytical mindset and extremely output-oriented•	Take initiative and ownership of work. Creative thinking and problem solving skills required•	Strong capability to draw insights/conclusions from raw data and summarize results quickly and efficiently•	Team player with excellent interpersonal skills, self-motivated, energetic, “CAN-DO” attitude and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-moving environment•	Strong data visualization skills is a plus, such as Excel pivot tables, Tableau, etc.

job_desp: Data Scientist – Supply Chain Management AutomationWho We Are? The Supply Chain Data Science team is responsible for predicting what customers want to buy and automate the ordering process. We create a daily demand forecast for all Coupang’s Retail SKUs, every day. We work with internal stakeholders to solve challenging Supply Chain problems at scale. Our systems ensure Coupang’s customers are delighted with consistently available products. Automation supports scale and efficiency of our Supply Chain processes.How We Do It? We use Machine Learning processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. We focus on Time Series models for predicting customer demand. We provide the Data Science team with Data Engineering, Software Engineer and Data Analysis resources to ensure the Data Science team can focus on building the best models. Our goal is to apply cutting edge models into our production environment, using a deep understanding of the e-commerce business domain to demonstrate results in production. We join big thinking with a pragmatic approach to measuring results. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Data Scientists work with a cross-functional team of Engineers, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly. Responsibilities: •	Cooperate with data scientists: Verify and implement models to predict customer demand, recommend supplier order quantities and make inventory management recommendations•	Build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Explore new Machine Learning applications to Time Series prediction•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Mentor junior engineers and provide career development adviceQualifications: •	8+ years software development experience;•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in Python or Java•	Working experience with Python ML libraries (SciKit, Pandas) a plus•	Working experience with R, Scala a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with both Relational DBs and NoSQL •	Passion to learn new technologies

job_desp: Software Development Manager – Demand ForecastingWho We Are? Supply Chain Automation is responsible for predicting what customers want to buy and automate the ordering process. We create a daily demand forecast for all Coupang’s Retail SKUs, every day. We work with internal stakeholders to solve challenging Supply Chain problems at scale. Our systems ensure Coupang’s customers are delighted with consistently available products. Automation supports scale and efficiency of our Supply Chain processes.How We Do It? We use Big Data processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly.Responsibilities: •	Lead a team of Software Engineers to develop scalable, reliable systems for Demand Forecasting •	Build and maintain UIs for internal customers to manage automation and provide visibility•	Cooperate with data scientists: Lead team to verify and implement models to predict customer demand over varying time periods and granularities•	Work with POs and external teams to create a feasible feature and technical roadmap•	Work with developers to design, build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Hire and Develop team Qualifications: •	8+ years experience, including 3+ years as a software engineer and 5+ years managing Agile software teams•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in Python or Java•	Working experience with Python ML libraries (SciKit, Pandas) a plus•	Working experience with R, Scala a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with microservices a plus•	Experience with both Relational DBs and NoSQL •	Passion to learn new technologies

job_desp: Role Description:The Sr. Data Scientist at MM is a data oriented master strategist and precision executioner who uses the latest data methodologies and technologies to help innovate, track, and refine MM product lines to achieve increased growth velocity.Job Responsibilities:A Data Scientist has goals and activities expected of him/her grouped under 3 specific Responsibilities as detailed below:1. Product & Strategy- Research impactful uses of big data to drive the development of new products to drive growth, retention, and conversion- Create new business opportunities via modelling and analysis using both internal and external data sources- Helping to define the (mid/long term) roadmap of App-intelligence programs at MM- Design meaningful performance indicators to track success for each product line.2. Teamwork and Collaboration- Understand the various business components and consult on data methods to monitor and enhane performance- Work closely with engineering teams on the implementation of data driven features- Make data science understandable in laymen terms and advocate the use of data science methods across cross-functional teams- Conduct project based training for analyst staff when required for data logic, modelling, etc.3. Leadership & Management- As business scope and data oriented program expand, proactively hire additional data staff to support growth efforts- Proactively stay on fore-front of data-driven methodologies and influence the entire tech organization on how to use data to create better user experienceJob Requirements:Must have:- Masters, PhD, or equivalent degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, etc.)- Strong statistical background and preferably a good knowledge of data mining techniques- Experience implementing Data-Science-related products (Recommendation Systems, Learn-to-Rank, etc.) in high-traffic (100k+ visitors per day) websites/apps.- Proficient in standard SQL.- Experience with statistical methodologies like cluster analysis and machine/statistical learning.- Communicate proficiently in English and MandarinDesirable:- Working proficiency with R statistical language for data manipulation, visualization, and analysis.- Experience writing code accessing MySQL or other relational databases.- Experience with Hive (Hadoop query language) or other Big Data technologies.- Prior experience with a few of the following models: Logistic Regression, Support Vector Machines, (Deep) Neural Networks, Hidden Markov Models, Conditional Random Fields, Game Theory, Mechanism Design and/or Latent Dirichlet Allocation- Basic proficiency with Linux/Unix OS and utilities.

job_desp: 题目：【硅谷大数据明星企业DataVisor】软件算法工程师硅谷大数据明星企业DataVisor，通过大数据算法为大型互联网和传统企业提供线上用户反欺诈服务，先后拿到NEA、金沙江创投A轮千万美金投资，并且获得元生资本B轮融资，为国内外知名客户包括Pinterest, Yelp, 陌陌和微店等等提供长期服务，是硅谷冉冉升起的大数据企业服务领域的新星。公司今年夏天进入中国市场，发展迅猛，寻求有算法经验的软件工程师加入我们中国总部的技术团队， base在北京望京。极具竞争力的薪水、奖金和股票期权，详情可以面谈。 职位描述：算法 / AI团队拥有DataVisor的秘密武器。我们在数亿用户产生的数千亿的事件中运行我们先进的无监督分析引擎及各种机器学习模型。我们是大数据软件工程师与数据科学家的结合体。我们擅长在数据中寻找优美的模型，来捕捉和防止恶意用户对正常用户恶意攻击。我们乐于提出新的想法并将其付诸实践，以改进我们的检测引擎。如果您有处理大数据的丰富经验，期待成为引领新技术前沿中的一员，并希望在直接影响公司利润的团队中工作，我们期待与您的进一步交流。 职位要求:1.     4年以上Java或C / C ++ / C＃使用经验2.     2年以上Web后端或Hadoop/ MapReduce/Spark使用经验3.     2年以上机器学习或人工智能相关工作经验的优先考虑4.     硕士以上学历，拥有博士学位者优先考虑5.     熟练的英文读写能力 我们提供的待遇:   1.     极具竞争力的薪水、奖金和股票期权2.     直接深度参与DataVisor的技术研发工作3.     直接和硅谷的团队对接学习第一手的硅谷大数据领先技术和工程经验4.     其他福利（五险一金，补充医疗保险，免费午餐，团建活动等等）

job_desp: Principal Java Engineer-LMS SystemWho We Are? Coupang’s Global Operation has 3 large operation groups: CS, FC, and Delivery. Together, the group consist of thousands full time, part time and outsourced workers. To help lower price component of the e­Commerce flywheel, increasing productivity is a key KPI for Global Ops team. Before improvements can be made, ops must first be able to measure their productivity. LMS (Labor Management System) aggregates information from our time/attendance and each operation tools. Using the information, the system will create reporting and analytics functions geared toward guiding compliance and answering productivity related questions. In 2017, the target is to have LMS support the 3 largest operation teams within Global Operation group, but LMS platform is extensible to support all Coupang operation teams in the future. LMS also includes the effective staffing, forecasting, scheduling, and real-time adjustments required for the organization to be as efficient as possible. The objective is to get the right number of people and the right workers, in the right place at the right time, doing the right tasks. How We Do? Each piece of LMS was generated by data, so the data accuracy is the most critical character. We built up the data platform as the foundation to collect, analyze and distribute the valued info with coupang systems. LMS is connected with WMS, TMS and Rings to share the productivity data and helps the high-level management team to adjust the business strategy.We create the hybrid mobile app to track the employees working behavior and status. Find anything possible to improve the productivity and also make the employee working balance better. To achieve that we would work with our Data Science team and introduce the Big Data into the system to obtain any data generated by operations, that would create the benchmark for each type of operation more accurate and efficient.In future, we’re going to make the work more predictable with Machine Learning, that will allow Coupang to better understand future demand to allow for more efficient scheduling. The real-time workforce data is critical to ensuring that Coupang’s business activities are less time consuming and more coherent and efficient. With effective labor management, Coupang will be able to provide exceptional service at the lowest cost possible.Responsibilities: •	Maintenance of the LMS data platform and hybrid app•	Develop new features of LMS data platform and hybrid app•	Translate application storyboards and use cases into functional applications•	Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications•	Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems•	Monitor the system and provide the root cause analysis report of issues•	Communicate and collaborate with other system teams to sync up data•	Work with Data warehouse team to verify the data among systemsQualifications: •	10+ years of experience in systems architecture, analysis and applications program development required•	B.S./ M.S. Computer Engineering/Science/MIS or equivalent•	Experience with Spring MVC, AngularJS, and RESTful•	Core Java developer with a desire to work in a fast paced, test-driven, agile, collaborative and iterative programming environment.•	Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git•	Familiarity with build tools such as Ant, Maven, and Gradle•	Experience with databases, SQL, query optimization, data modeling•	NoSQL(Redis/Cassandra/HBase/MongoDB)•	Self motivated, takes initiative and works well with extended team members.•	Passion to learn new technologies•	Excellent oral and written English communication skills•	Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, EMR) is plus

job_desp: Data Scientist– Sales and Operations Planning AutomationWho We Are? The Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP) team is a new team focused on using Discrete Event Simulation, time series prediction and optimization techniques to predict inbound and outbound volume. Better inventory flow predictions allow us to reduce safety stock levels, effectively manage warehouse inbound capacity and improve FC operations. Effective, automated S&OP is a key driver for growth and efficiency of our physical operations. The S&OP team is part of the Supply Chain Management Automation organization. SCM Automation is responsible for automating a variety of SCM functions, from demand forecast and automated buying to inventory management and inbound optimization. We work with internal stakeholders to solve challenging Supply Chain problems at scale. Our systems ensure Coupang’s customers are delighted with consistently available products. Automation supports scale and efficiency of our Supply Chain processes.How We Do It? The S&OP team will use Discrete Event Simulation and statistical modeling to evaluate network capacity and predict inbound and inventory volume. S&OP Data Scientists work with a dedicated engineering team to build production systems that can be used to provide daily insight. Our goal is to apply cutting edge models into our production environment, using a deep understanding of the e-commerce business domain to demonstrate results in production. We join big thinking with a pragmatic approach to measuring results. Responsibilities: •	Apply techniques from Discrete Event Simulation to automate S&OP predictions•	Explore new Machine Learning applications to Time Series prediction•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Mentor junior Data Scientists and provide project and career development adviceQualifications: •	7+ years relevant experience;•	Masters in Operations Research, Applied Statistics or Computer Science •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in modeling and simulation•	Experience in Retail or Manufacturing Supply Chain•	Deep understanding of statistical distributions •	Working experience with simulation packages (Arena, SimPy, Matlab, RespastJ, etc)•	Working experience with Python, R, Scala a plus•	Passion to learn new technologies

job_desp: AI CPO/产品总监/经理岗位职责：1. 贯彻执行公司产品体系规划和发展路线，编写产品需求设计和策划文档，管理产品版本和功能点；2. 对接AI语音、计算机视觉等核心技术、开发、测试、设计、市场应用各个环节，推动产品的功能完善、性能改进；3. 保障产品成功应用于市场并不断收集用户反馈，分析服务和运营数据从而形成闭环；4. 针对AI业务和行业角度，协同团队探索研究新的商业模式，提炼产品形态落地推进；5. 对市场、品牌提供培训和文档支持，任职资格：3年以上相关工作经验最好是AI领域ToB产品经验，精通各类产品设计的工具和流程；较强的企业需求、用户体验控制能力，对AI语音、计算机视觉产品有着深入理解；对机器学习(ML)下深度学习(DL)原理熟悉；自然语义理解(NLP/NLU)，语音识别(ASR)技术产品喜爱，或者有一定语音交互人机界面(VUI)的产品经验；清晰的逻辑思维能力，优秀的学习能力，出色的表达、沟通、随机应变等综合能力，良好的团队合作意识；优先考虑：有AI客服系统、呼叫中心产品、企业服务类、Saas类产品经验优先；AI行业专家岗位职责：1. 研究分析国家人工智能发展政策，跟踪国内外人工智能领域的产业发展与创新最新动态，负责公司人工智能业务发展策略制定及实施，撰写研究报告、技术报告；2. 对人工智能在学术界和工业界有前瞻性，探索人工智能领域前沿技术，研究人工智能行业创新应用，提供全面的技术解决方案；3. 负责组建及带领人工智能团队，达成公司业务发展目标，帮助公司战略升级；4. 带领团队推进人工智能领域的研究，为政府和企业客户提供人工智能规划设计和建设运营落地的咨询服务；5. 负责组织人工智能项目的前期考察、用户需求调研、可行性分析、落地方案等文档编写、宣讲、技术交流与培训等工作；6. 跟进项目进展情况，组织召开项目技术研讨会，解决项目中出现的重大疑难技术问题；7. 负责推进公司与国内外人工智能相关机构的技术交流合作，协调相关工作。8. 指导、培训人工智能工程师的业务开展与实施；9. 与客户保持良好沟通，实时把握客户需求，及时反馈相关客户需求及问题;10. 团队的建设与管理，任职资格： 计算机、信息工程、自动化、产业经济等相关专业，本科及以上学历，或高级工程师职称，硕士博士优先；人工智能专业领域领军人才，具备前沿技术视野，显著的科研和工作成果，有一定行业影响力；熟悉常用的深度学习主流算法和框架，熟悉大数据处理和挖掘相关技术者优先；在机器学习、深度学习 、自然语言处理、图像语音识别等领域有研究或研发项目经历，有较丰富的大中型开发项目的总体规划、方案设计经验优先；具备互联网思维，热衷技术创新，有较强的沟通协作和资源整合能力，能快速带领项目团队协同工作；较强学习能力，善于把握客户痛点及发掘客户需求；有较强的文档写作能力，较强的对外宣讲和内部沟通能力；具备良好的责任心，理解分析能力、推动执行能力、在高科技领域有人脉资源优先。具有很强的责任心与敬业精神，能高效管理下属团队。

job_desp: 一、java职位描述：1.独立完成较复杂的系统分析、设计，并主导完成详细设计和编码的任务，确保项目的进度和质量;2.负责系统的规划设计，持续完善和优化，制定产品的技术发展路线；3.审核开发人员的系统设计和代码质量，书写技术文档和制定开发规范，辅导团队成员的技术能力提升。4.面向蚂蚁的数亿用户建设具有大规模，高吞吐量同时具有高稳定度的系统，面向蚂蚁及千万级商家提供通用、灵活、智能的业务支撑能力平台;职位要求:1. JAVA基础扎实：精通多线程编程，熟悉分布式,缓存,消息队列等机制；熟悉JVM，包括内存模型、类加载机制以及性能优化；2. 对各种开源的框架如Spring、Hibernate等有深入的了解，对框架本身有过开发或重构者可优先考虑；3. 精通关系型数据库设计及SQL,精通unix/linux操作系统；4. 具备良好的识别业务关键需求和设计领域模型的能力；5. 热爱技术，工作认真、严谨，对系统质量有近乎苛刻的要求意识，善于沟通与团队协作；6. 有大型分布式、高并发、高负载、高可用性系统设计和稳定性经验优先；二、算法职位描述1、设计和研发支付、营销、运营等相关业务的算法，满足智能营销、异常检测、波动分析等场景需求；2、根据业务需求，参与从业务分析、特征分析、模型建立、算法实现等过程，并逐步迭代算法效果；3、对已有算法与服务进行性能优化，提升算法效能，扩大算法应用场景。职位要求1、在机器学习、统计分析、大数据处理等领域有一定的功底，2年以上相关工作经验；2、优秀的算法应用能力，包括特征提取、模型建立、效果评估、应用部署以及优化迭代等环节；3、优秀的编程能力，至少熟悉一门常用语言及相关的算法库，如java、python、R等；4、对时间序列建模和营销场景推荐、效果预估、效果分析等领域有一定的经验优先；5、熟练使用spark、hadoop、hive等分布式计算优先；6、计算机、数学或统计学等相关专业优先。热衷于创新技术，适应一定的工作压力；7、较强的业务敏感度，数据敏感度的优先。三、测试开发职位描述1. 参与软件产品测试的全流程，包括参与需求分析、设计评审，制定测试计划，设计和执行测试用例，进行缺陷跟踪和软件质量分析等；2. 执行项目测试，包括制定测试计划，分配测试资源，构建测试环境，执行集成测试，回归测试等；3. 保证被测系统的质量，并通过测试流程和方法创新，努力提升研发的质量和效率。职位要求1. 工科、计算机或其他相关专业本科以上学历；2. 熟悉C/C++/Java等至少一种编程语言，有Shell或Ruby/PHP/Perl/Python等使用经验者优先；3. 至少3年以上软件测试开发工作经验；4. 有性能、安全、白盒测试等专业测试领域经验者优先；5. 具备Android/IOS无线app产品、互联网广告、搜索、大数据处理、分布式系统、数据库和网络等业务领域测试经验者优先；6. 熟悉Linux或Unix操作系统;7. 精通测试流程和测试用例设计方法,能主动进行技术钻研；8. 解决复杂问题和编写自动测试工具和系统的能力；9. 很强的逻辑思维能力，谈判的能力和冲突管理的能力；10. 善于团队合作，理解和适应变化，以结果和行动为准则，努力追求成功。四、数据分析职位描述1. 通过机器学习等技术进行数据分析及建模的方案的系统化设计，负责数据挖掘项目的架构设计工作2. 分析用户行为，对用户进行建模，设计合理的模型和算法3. 设计营销算法，ab实验，以数据为驱动的实验调优4. 对现有系统的架构进行深入分析及优化，进一步提升系统数据和算法能力，构建智能营销平台职位要求1. 计算机、数学、统计学、运筹学、机器学习等相关专业，具有扎实的统计和数据挖掘、建模基础；2. 熟练编程，具有丰富的独立实现算法和调优的经验，熟悉python等脚本语言优先3. 具备较丰富的基于Hadoop ／ mapreduce ／ Spark等大数据处理项目经验优先4. 熟悉常用算法，熟悉至少一种常用算法框架（Caffe, sklearn, tensorflow）5. 对数据敏感，具有良好的逻辑思维能力、理解业务的能力、沟通能力和表达呈现能力，主动性强6. 在某一算法领域比如推荐、图像、NLP等具备很强的专业技能者优先五、客户端开发职位描述1. 胜任核心系统负责人的角色，体系化梳理和优化架构设计，确保系统的高可用和在线服务的稳定；2. 根据产品需求开发相关的移动产品；3. 验证和修正测试中发现的问题；4. 公司内部iOS/Android开发技术培训。岗位要求1. 两年以上客户端开发经验，精通iOS/Android手机平台；2. 熟悉掌握至少一种主流手机平台编程语言（C，C++或Java等）；3. 精通iOS/Android平台下的高性能编程及性能调优；4. 开发基础良好，理解设计模式，在项目或产品中有很好的设计实践；5. 有强烈的责任心和团队精神，善于沟通和合作；能独立完成设计和编码；6. 对iOS/Android的UI控件有实际使用和优化经验者优先，有前端开发经验者优先。六、安全职位职责：1、负责支付宝业务的安全代码审计、渗透测试和漏洞挖掘等工作，根据安全风险提供安全建议和解决方案；2、应急响应事件处理。3、安全攻防技术研究。职位要求：1、熟悉WEB安全渗透和漏洞挖掘（黑盒和白盒），熟悉漏洞的内在原理、检测方法、利用手段以及对应解决方案。2、熟悉JAVA，熟悉Spring框架和使用。七、前端职位描述1. 参与多种平台的应用开发，包括 web 及 native 等产品，负责前端框架和基础组件。2. 充分理解项目和设计需求，高效完成业务需求。3. 跟进社区发展，组织团队成员学习研究新技术，分享经验，并转化到潜在项目以及帮助团队成长。职位要求1. 前端基础方面：熟悉 ecmascript/css/html 最新规范2. 应用开发方面：熟练掌握 react/react-native 以及配套社区项目(redux/rxjs/…)，了解社区动向（reactconf 2017/fiber/…），了解 ios 或 android 语言以及对应平台 UI 框架基础。3. 前端架构方面： 了解 jquery/vue/angular/react 等常用前端类库／框架的设计原理。4. 工具辅助方面：熟悉基于 node 的工具链体系(gulp/webpack/…).岗位要求：base：北京、上海、杭州、成都都有

job_desp: Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. Our mission is to create a world in which Customers ask “How did I ever live without Coupang?” We are looking for passionate builders to help us get there. Powered by world-class technology and operations, we have set out to transform the end-to-end Customer experience -- from revolutionizing last-mile delivery to rethinking how Customers search and discover on a truly mobile-first platform. We have been named one of the “50 Smartest Companies in the World” by MIT Technology Review and “30 Global Game Changers” by Forbes.Coupang is a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.Who We Are? Search is an effective way to help customer to discovery product to purchase on Coupang website. Search drives over 50 % of GMV and currently powers all key product search and discovery experiences across Coupang. As selection and traffic continue to grow,  it is quite The core mission for Search Availability and Scalability from an customer perspective is:When I search on Coupang, I expect it is always available, return search results fast with accurate information. I like the convenience and big selection of Coupang and I need to find product easily no matter how many products on Coupang website.Search measurement platform teams help building measurement infra/services for detect/monitor the business/search metric data, developing the search QA & Debugging, evaluation services improving different ranking/recommendation and other algorithms.How we doChina Search measurement platform team help to build the state-of- the-art services to define/measure/detect business and search service performances through BIG DATA and Machine learning expertise. We try to build the data-driven culture for search service improvement and business decision process.  We work closely with teams in Seoul, Silicon Valley, Seattle and word-class experts used to work in Google, Facebook, Pinterest.  trying to build the BEST product search engine for e-business in the world!Responsibilities:•	Development/maintenance search ranking signals to help improve the search ranking results•	Support and maintain search metrics data & pipeline•	Data mining on user log data and human evaluation data, as to generate data insights report for business decision and search ranking improvingQualifications: •	Bachelor’s Degree or above in CS or related major•	Good at Java and linux/shell environment•	Experience on data analysis, common search algorithms(ranking,recommendation), machine learning practice is a big plus•	Experience with Solr, Lucence, Elastic search is a plus•	Experience with SQL/HQL scripts , NoSQL (Redis/Cassandra/HBase/MongoDB) is a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Hadoop/Spark/Hive/Pig/Sqoop/Oozie/Presto/Zeppelin) is a plus•	Good communication skills, Excellent reading and writing in English. Technical conversational English is highly desired.•	Lead level candidate is preferred.

job_desp: 职责描述：由支付宝自主研发的智能实时风险监控系统，是目前世界上最先进的网上支付风险实时监控系统之一。该系统基于用户行为来判断风险等级，集风险分析、预警、控制为一体，7*24小时全天候风险监控，保障支付宝每天亿万级交易的资金安全。我们探索的是世界上独一无二的、领先的基于海量数据风控解决方案，加入我们一起来建设下一代的风控数据实时计算体系，一起从IT时代跨越到DT时代，迎接互联网金融时代全新的挑战。 1. 建设风控相关的数据体系，搭建整个风控数据计算层。 2. 根据安全风控需求，设计/规划/编码落地相关数据计算方案，保障性能和稳定性。 3. 维护/增强现有系统在高并发情况下的性能、稳定性。任职要求：1. 本科或以上学历，计算机软件或相关专业；3年以上工作经验； 2. 精通Java语言及J2EE体系结构，有大型Web后台开发经验者优先；3. 熟悉Spring、SpringMVC、iBatis等开源框架； 4. 熟悉各种NoSQL产品，对分布式架构熟悉者优先； 5. 对高并发情况下，对性能调优，并发计算等有经验者优先； 6. 对流式计算有实战经验、熟悉storm、spark等流式计算框架优先； 7. 对数据挖掘和机器学习有所了解，包括常用的机器学习算法和数据建模过程的优先。

job_title: 大数据挖掘分析工程师

job_req:
本科及以上 经验不限
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: 职责描述：通过数据指标的设计、计算、监控和评估，支持产品决策与数据化运营；深入分析用户画像、用户行为路径等相关问题，发现 insights，通过报告提出建议；与数据工程师合作，迭代和优化数据分析平台，维护数据仓库中间层，确保数据准确性；通过数据量化用户的学习效果，衡量产品功能和教学方法对提升学习水平的效率。任职要求：计算机、统计、数学或工程类相关专业本科及以上学历。2年以上相关工作经验；熟悉互联网的数据运营与产品决策过程，精通指标的设计和计算；有负责 SQL 计算经验；有一定的 R/Python 的基础知识；熟悉 WEB / APP 埋点，有漏斗、行为路径分析经验；熟悉 GA / Umeng / Growing IO 等第三方工具原理；熟悉基本的数理统计分析，例如相关性，聚类等；熟悉基础的分类、回归机器学习方法；结果导向；能独立承担复杂分析的项目，提供有价值的结论和可执行的建议。加分项：熟悉 Shell, 有基本的存储过程或 ETL 调度经验；熟悉 Git，有良好的项目组织和代码整理习惯；熟悉 Hive / Spark，了解大数据工具与传统 DB 的查询使用差异；熟悉 R / Python / Julia 中的一个或多个数据分析和可视化工具链。关于我们英语流利说是一家全球领先的AI驱动的教育科技公司，由中央“千人计划”专家、普斯林顿大学计算机博士、Google前产品经理王翌和胡哲人、林晖在2012年9月共同创立。英语流利说拥有一支业内领先的人工智能科学家团队，致力于用AI技术和大数据提升学习效率，实现教育的个性化和公平性。经过五年的积累，移动端同名APP“英语流利说”的注册用户数已超过5000万人，在语言教育行业高居第一，被苹果公司评为“年度精选App”和“App Store精华”。“英语流利说”拥有全球最大的中国人英语语音数据库，领先的英语口语评测引擎，以及中国最活跃的语言学习社区。2016年7月，推出历时两年斥巨资打造的世界领先的人工智能老师——“懂你英语”，为每个用户提供个性化的学习内容和计划，把英语学习的效率提高了3倍，被业界称为是一次语言学习的革命。目前，英语流利说已完成C轮投资，前几轮投资方分别为IDG、GGV、挚信资本等知名VC。

job_desp: Job SummaryData scientist in Discovery team provides business analytic skills towards petabytes of data from a multiple heterogeneous data sources. They must be able to understand the business requirements and use cases of the customer and apply their knowledge around analytics and statistics to solve complex business and data problems. Furthermore, the Big Data Scientist should lead the customer in determining the relevant and compelling questions to ask. In this way, the big data scientist helps a customer understand the potential meaning that can be extracted from their data by applying big data analytics. Help shape the business its rapidly evolving, entrepreneurial culture by taking on impactful projects that add real value company wide. Expertise required in modeling and mining large data sets using technologies such as Aster, R, Matlab, SAS, SPSS, Python, Hive, etc. Experience in different mining techniques to find associations, correlations, evidence, inferences, clusters for big data analytics is key to perform the required job responsibilities. Hands on expertise needed in agile data analytics experiments and creation/deployment of models and algorithm to analyze social, machine, text, sensor, streaming, large volume structured as well as unstructured data. Experience in operations research, statistical modeling, simulation or deep data mining in specific domains required. Must Qualifications	  Strong mathematical and statistical background (modeling, statistics, analytics, math) 	  M.S. or Ph.D. in a relevant data science or operations research	  Experience in solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches 	  Expertise required in modeling and mining large data sets using technologies such as Aster, R, Matlab, SAS, SPSS, Python, Hive, etc.	  Fluent in statistical analysis, data mining, and machine language	  Knowledge of SQLWork EnvironmentPreferred Qualifications	  Knowledge with Database, EDW, HADOOP, Map/Reduce and PIG 	  Strong business acumen 	  Ability to communicate with business and IT leaders in a way that can influence how an organization approaches business.Key Responsibilities	  Recommend ways in which the business can apply their data to business problems 	  Use Aster or other analytic tools to analyze peta byte scale ad and data to deliver insightful analytics that solve key client business problems. 	  Develop innovative experimental design and measurement methodologies 	  Innovate new modeling and machine learning approaches 	  Collaborate on compelling new analytical reporting, products and features for our clients that enable data driven decision making. 	  Find and interpret data rich sources, merge data together, ensure data consistency. 	  Manage large amounts of data within the domain of hardware, software and bandwidth constraints. 	  Translate the understanding into well engineered and easy to maintain data concepts 	  Question existing assumptions and processes.

job_desp: Responsibilities:We are currently recruiting for a motivated and passionate Data Engineer who is responsible for developing, optimizing and operating our data pipeline and applications, which are used to help implement innovation data platform process applications and give smart insights. In this role you will establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data pipelines, as well as building insightful applications based on open-ended pool of data. Job Requirements:* Build the infrastructure to gather and process large volumes of raw data into data suitable for analysis* Design and implement near real-time data applications on top of huge amount of data* Enhance data product like query/monitoring/analysis to ease common users work in big data environment* Support operational monitoring requests from business team* Track risk operation issues and work with partners on investigation Basic Qualifications * Bachelor’s degree with 3 years working experience in relevant field* Strong programming skills in Java, Scala or Python; hands on with one of the scripting languages: Bash or Perl* Experience in custom data pipeline design, implementation and maintenance* Experience in big data programming (Hadoop/Spark/Kafka/Storm)* Experience in database usage (MySQL/MongoDB/Redis)* Experience in web development and machine learning application is a big plus* Knowledge of AWS Data Stack using S3, EMR, Data Pipeline,Lambda,Kinesis* Good verbal and written communication skills in English------------数据开发工程师---------------工作职责：我们目前正在招聘一位积极和热情的数据工程师，负责开发，优化和运营我们的数据处理平台和应用程序，用于帮助实施创新数据平台流程应用程序并提供明智的见解。在此角色中，您将为大型数据处理管道的平台建立可扩展，高效，自动化的流程，并建立基于开放数据池的有见地的应用程序。工作要求：*构建基础设施，将大量原始数据收集并处理成适合分析的数据*在大量数据之上设计和实现近实时数据应用*加强数据产品，如查询/监控/分析，以减轻普通用户在大数据环境中的工作*支持业务团队的运营监控要求*跟踪风险操作问题，并与合作伙伴进行调查基本资格*本科以上学历，3年以上的相关工作经验*熟练使用Java 或Scala或Python编程语言;同时擅长使用Bash或Perl*具有定制数据处理管道设计，实施和维护方面的经验*拥有基于大数据平台的编程经验（Hadoop / Spark / Kafka / Storm）*丰富的数据库使用经验（MySQL / MongoDB / Redis）*最好具有网页开发和机器学习应用的经验*了解使用基于AWS的S3，EMR，Data pipeline，Lambda，Kinesis*良好的英语口语和书面沟通能力

job_req:
本科及以上 8年以上经验
语言不限 年龄不限
job_desp: Software Development Manager – Sales & Operation Planning (S&OP)Coupang is the world’s fastest growing e-Commerce company. In only its fourth year, Coupang boasts over 20mn subscribers and annual revenue run rate of over $2bn. It is the No. 1 player in mobile e-commerce in Korea, which is a massive $50bn market opportunity. On top of that, in Jun 2015, we raised $1B in an investment led by SoftBank. It comes less than half a year after we received $300mn led by BlackRock BLK Private Equity Partners, and a year after we raised $100mn in a round led by Sequoia Capital Global Equities and Sequoia Heritage venture funds, which then valued the company at more than $5B.Who We Are? S&OP is responsible for leveraging end to end operation cost to provide best service for our customer under limited resources. Our mission is to reduce operation cost, mitigate FC backlog issues, improve data accuracy and integrity, provide predicted resource planning visibility to operation team, and also enhance the robustness and scalability of the systems.How We Do It? We use Big Data processes to generate our forecasts for business operation decisions. Our products consist of AWS infrastructure and Redshift DB etc. Our systems also integrate with other operation systems including FC, SCM Platform, Automated buying systems which are used for FC operation, Ordering execution, Auto-order generation. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our FC operation & Ordering execution running efficiently and smoothly.We use Big Data processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly.Responsibilities: •	Lead a team of Software Engineers to develop scalable, reliable systems for volume Forecasting •	Build and maintain UIs for internal customers to manage operation planning and provide visibility•	Cooperate with data scientists: Lead team to verify and implement models to predict operation demand over varying time periods and granularities•	Work with POs/TPMs and external teams to create a feasible feature and technical roadmap•	Work with developers to design, build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Hire and Develop team Qualifications: •	8+ years experience, including 3+ years as a software engineer and 5+ years managing Agile software teams•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph. D. a plus•	Expertise in Python or Java•	Working experience with Python ML libraries (SciKit, Pandas) a plus•	Working experience with R, Scala a plus•	Experience with big data ecosystem (Spark, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie);•	Experience with microservices a plus•	Experience with both Relational DBs and NoSQL •	Passion to learn new technologies
address: 公司地址：上海市浦东新区金科路2889号 长泰广场C座 7楼

Coupang is the world’s fastest growing e-Commerce company and South Korea’s answer to Amazon. Coupang is currently valued at $5 billion. In only its fourth year, Coupang boasts over 20 million subscribers and annual revenue run rate over $2 billion. It is the #1 player in mobile e-commerce in Korea, which is a massive $50 billion market opportunity.Coupang’s goal is to provide a consistent shopping experience that blends both “discovery” and “intent” based shopping with superior product selection and customer service. We enable this via our innovative mobile application, optimized delivery network, as well as leveraging a highly scalable platform and best in class data analytics.About the role:Engineering leaders at Coupang play a critical role in building platform and services at scale that directly help with customer acquisition, experience and conversion. In this role you will build and lead a product development team focused on design, development and operation of marketing platform and services. You will use real-time data processing and machine learning to optimize for the best marketing channel to target the right group of customers at the right time. Outcomes:●	Increase active Customer base by millions while growing wallet share by double digit percentage points●	Build a marketing tech center of excellence consisting of platform engineers, data engineers, machine learning engineers and product owner(s)●	Leverage real-time data processing and machine learning to build a closed-loop automated marketing platform that can support campaign management, automated ad targeting, bidding, offer matching, budget optimization and various other AI/ML based servicesRequirements:●	Strong technical credentials, with at least 7 years leading or managing software engineering teams●	Proven track record of delivering software products on time using agile processes in a fast paced environment●	Strong verbal and written communication skills and demonstrate proven technical leadership●	Experience working closely with distributed global teams●	Hands-on architecture and large scale distributed systems experience●	Hands-on experience in AdTech, MarTech, eCommerce and/or Machine Learning●	Strong sense of ownership, urgency, and drive. High on bias for action●	Smart about choosing between fast and right●	Strong analytical skills with excellent problem solving abilities●	Master’s degree in Computer Science or the equivalent strongly preferred●	Development experience in OOP, Java, JavaScript frameworks, Web services, Data warehouses and NoSql●	Experience with customer insights, user segmentation and streaming analytics is a plus

job_desp: Software Development Manager – Sales & Operation Planning (S&OP)Who We Are? S&OP is responsible for leveraging end to end operation cost to provide best service for our customer under limited resources. Our mission is to reduce operation cost, mitigate FC backlog issues, improve data accuracy and integrity, provide predicted resource planning visibility to operation team, and also enhance the robustness and scalability of the systems.How We Do It? We use Big Data processes to generate our forecasts for business operation decisions. Our products consist of AWS infrastructure and Redshift DB etc. Our systems also integrate with other operation systems including FC, SCM Platform, Automated buying systems which are used for FC operation, Ordering execution, Auto-order generation. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our FC operation & Ordering execution running efficiently and smoothly.We use Big Data processes to generate our daily forecast and buying decisions. Our systems are built on Hadoop and Spark, with forecasting models implemented in Python using SciPy, NumPy, etc. Our Automated Buying systems combine machine learning with human oversight. Software Engineers work with a cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Analysts and Product Owners to build world-class systems that keep our Supply Chain running smoothly.Responsibilities: •	Lead a team of Software Engineers to develop scalable, reliable systems for volume Forecasting •	Build and maintain UIs for internal customers to manage operation planning and provide visibility•	Cooperate with data scientists: Lead team to verify and implement models to predict operation demand over varying time periods and granularities•	Work with POs/TPMs and external teams to create a feasible feature and technical roadmap•	Work with developers to design, build and maintain our Big Data infrastructure to scale and support new use cases•	Analyze information acquired and compare solutions and weight them against the actual needs, provide root cause analysis affecting key business problems;•	Hire and Develop team Qualifications: •	8+ years experience, including 3+ years as a software engineer and 5+ years managing Agile software teams•	Masters in Computer Science or Engineering; •	Ph.
